==============================================================
**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================================================

**Title:** Intermediate (Level 2) Life Cycle Management Specialist

**Reference:** cb-779-40974952

**Amendment:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2024-07

**Publication Date:** 2024-03-02

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-19T14:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-03-31

**Trade Agreements:** Various international trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Unspsc:** *81141600, Supply chain management*

**Procurement Category:** Service

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest cost-per-point

**Region of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:** National Defence

**Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Description:** This tender solicitation is being issued for the provision of one (1) Intermediate (Level 2) Life Cycle Management Specialist to support Directorate Aerospace Equipment Program Management (Tactical Aviation & Simulators) [DAEPM(TA&S)] of the Department of National Defence.

**Number of Contracts:** This bid solicitation is intended to result in the award of one (1) contract for two (2) years, plus two (2) irrevocable option years.

**Services Required:** One (1) Intermediate (Level 2) Life Cycle Management Specialist to provide technical, engineering, and maintenance services, with a scope of work including:

* Stream 5: Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services
* Category 16: Life Cycle Management Specialist - Intermediate

**Security Requirements:** Supplier Security Clearance required: FSC - Secret. Security Level required (Document Safeguarding): None.

**Contact Information:** Chantal Leavoy, DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Tenders Submitted:** Suppliers must submit their tenders electronically, with no hard copy submissions accepted. The closing date is 2024-03-19T14:00:00.
